common.gui.controllers

Class ParentGUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.gui.controllers.LoadGUIController
      • common.gui.controllers.SetUpMainGUIController
        • common.gui.controllers.ParentGUIController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ParentGUIController
extends SetUpMainGUIController
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The Controller of MainScene.fxml. This controller handles the fxml itself.
    The controller extends SetUpMainGUIController
    See Also:
    SetUpMainGUIController}

      • logInSuccess

        public void logInSuccess()
        After the log in will occur successfully, the menu will be adjusted appropriately.
        At the end, LoadGUIController.loadMainMenu() will occur.

      • setDBStatus

        public void setDBStatus(java.lang.Boolean dbStatus)
        Invoked by ClientController when the ParentGUIController asked for the status of the data base.
        Parameters:
        dbStatus - indicates if the data base connected at the server side (true) or not (false)

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
           throws java.io.IOException
        The function which will load the Application.
        Parameters:
        stage - the Stage of the Application
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when can't invoke FXMLLoader.load()
        See Also:
        Application#start(Stage)}

      • logOut

        public void logOut()
        The User will disconnected from the Application, and the Application will restart.

      • logOutUserInSystem

        public void logOutUserInSystem()
        Marks the User as connected, to prevent more Log Ins in other devices.

      • getNewOrderByStore

        public void getNewOrderByStore(boolean loadHomePage)
        the function asks for existing Order by cbStores value.
        Additionally, the function will invoke LoadGUIController.loadMainMenu() by loadHomePage.
        Parameters:
        loadHomePage - if true, MainMenuGUIController will be loaded.

      • storeChanged

        public void storeChanged()
        When Store in the LoadGUIController.cbStores is changed, the function will invoke getNewOrderByStore(boolean)

                      throws java.lang.Exception

        Returns:
        The current Store
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the return statement not called
